tool.name: Differential peak detection
tool.description: based on paired four bedgraph files
tool.command:
macs2 bdgdiff --t1 $infile_pileup_cond1 --t2 $infile_pileup_cond2 --c1 $infile_control_cond1 --c2 $infile_control_cond2 --cutoff $cutoff --min-len $minlen --depth1 $depth1 --depth2 $depth2
# Why does #if '--ofile-cond1' in $outputs not work? #if '--ofile-cond1' in str($outputs).split(','): --ofile-cond1 $output_cond1 #end if
#if '--ofile-cond2' in str($outputs).split(','): --ofile-cond2 $output_cond2 #end if
#if '--ofile-both-conditions' in str($outputs).split(','): --ofile-both-conditions $output_both #end if

param.name: infile_control_cond1
param.label: MACS control lambda bedGraph for condition 1

param.name: infile_control_cond2
param.label: MACS control lambda bedGraph for condition 2

param.name: cutoff
param.label: Cutoff of log10 likelihood ratio cutoff

param.name: depth1
param.label: Sequence depth of condition 1 in million reads

param.name: depth2
param.label: Sequence depth of condition 2 in million reads

validator.message: Please select at least one output file.

tool.help:
